[00:18.26]Got an expensive taste
[00:20.03]She tried lie for the money uh
[00:21.79]Know that girl want my cake yeah
[00:23.29]My chain straight from the ocean uh
[00:25.04]You chain straight from the lake yeah
[00:26.95]Slam on her O'Neal
[00:28.71]I do not care how you feel
[00:30.41]All my diamonds they teal
[00:32.14]White gold but your chain steel
[00:33.83]Boy you so broke that's real
[00:35.49]Armstrong on the money like Neil
[00:37.26]Red stripes when I lift my shoe
[00:38.91]Red bottom on the bottom of her heel
[00:40.66]Um yeah we take the top off the foreigns
[00:42.84]Take the top off 'less she snorin'
[00:44.14]Skrr
[00:44.52]Um yeah take my red bottoms on vacay'
[00:46.46]Then she woke up and she orange
[00:47.63]Vroom
[00:47.81]Um yeah I can tell them n***as fake
[00:49.91]But I don't know what he on
[00:51.13]Oh yeah he know that he just make it rain
[00:53.10]But I'm just making storm
[00:54.38]Woah woah
[00:54.96]Oh yeah
[00:55.29]Ayy ayy ayy ayy
[00:58.67]None of these b***hes I chase uh
[01:00.38]B***h I'm addicted to Chase ayy
[01:02.09]Money stack up in my safe ayy
[01:03.84]Racks busting out so it ain't safe ayy
[01:06.40]She wanna hit my w**d but I told this girl this a face
[01:08.87]Ayy
[01:09.27]I swear y'all n***as y'all late
[01:10.42]Y'all turnin' the human in me right into bait
[01:11.93]Ayy
[01:12.42]Your pockets so weight
[01:13.59]You tryna keep up in them s**ts they deflate
[01:15.26]Yeah
[01:15.73]Okay I got me a 'Gatti
[01:17.09]Uh
[01:17.53]Just in case you try to race
[01:18.92]Ayy
[01:19.29]Okay I know 'bout some bodies
[01:20.93]But I put my hand on my face
[01:22.05]I might move like I'm Kobe
[01:23.16]But I'm far from a snake
[01:25.15]Said I live in the moment
[01:26.72]Got an expensive taste
[01:28.52]She tried lie for the money uh
[01:30.31]Know that girl want my cake yeah
[01:31.78]My chain straight from the ocean uh
[01:33.51]Your chain straight from the lake yeah
[01:35.50]Slam on her O'Neal
[01:37.31]I do not care how you feel
[01:39.00]All my diamonds they teal

[01:42.39]Boy you so broke that's real
[01:44.08]I'm strung on the money like Neal
[01:45.82]Red stripes when I lift my shoe
[01:47.46]Red bottoms on the bottom of her heel
data.trans:
[ti:I Can Show You (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Uzi Vert]
[al:Eternal Atake (Deluxe) - LUV vs. The World 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.75]Working On Dying制作
[00:13.28]我或许就像科比一样
[00:14.94]我不是阴险小人
[00:16.56]我活在当下
[00:18.26]我的爱好很奢侈
[00:20.03]她为了钱撒谎
[00:21.79]我知道那个姑娘想要我的钱
[00:23.29]我的项链上面挂满了钻石
[00:25.04]你的项链简直不值一提
[00:26.95]给她沉痛一击
[00:28.71]我不在乎你的感受
[00:30.41]我的钻石都是蓝绿色
[00:32.14]戴着白金项链 而你的项链都是铁的
[00:33.83]小子 你太穷了 这无可反驳
[00:35.49]我的钞票无与伦比的多
[00:37.26]我把鞋子提起来 就能看到红色的条纹
[00:38.91]她的高跟鞋 鞋底是红色
[00:40.66]我们把进口车的车篷放下来
[00:42.84]取下车篷 现在她在打鼾了
[00:44.14]//
[00:44.52]穿着红底鞋子去度假
[00:46.46]她一觉醒来 欣喜不已
[00:47.63]//
[00:47.81]我看得出来 那些家伙都是骗子
[00:49.91]但我不知道他想干嘛
[00:51.13]他知道自己可以让钞票满天飞
[00:53.10]但我可以让钞票遍撒大地
[00:54.38]//
[00:54.96]//
[00:55.29]//
[00:58.67]我从不追求这些娘们
[01:00.38]但我喜欢追名逐利
[01:02.09]钞票塞在我的保险箱里
[01:03.84]都已经溢出来了 所以这也不保险
[01:06.40]她想享用我的货 但我告诉这个姑娘 这可不是一般的东西
[01:08.87]//
[01:09.27]我发誓 你们这些家伙 已经无药可救
[01:10.42]你们让我内心的狂躁越来越强烈
[01:11.93]//
[01:12.42]你的口袋里就那么点东西
[01:13.59]你想保持自己的实力 但是终究逃不过失败
[01:15.26]//
[01:15.73]好的 我给自己买了一辆布加迪
[01:17.09]//
[01:17.53]以防万一你要和我比一比
[01:18.92]//
[01:19.29]我知道那些违法犯罪的事情
[01:20.93]但我用手挡住我的脸
[01:22.05]我或许就像科比一样
[01:23.16]我不是阴险小人
[01:25.15]我活在当下
[01:26.72]我的爱好很奢侈
[01:28.52]她为了钱撒谎
[01:30.31]我知道那个姑娘想要我的钱
[01:31.78]我的项链上面挂满了钻石
[01:33.51]你的项链简直不值一提
[01:35.50]给她沉痛一击
[01:37.31]我不在乎你的感受
[01:39.00]我的钻石都是蓝绿色
[01:40.70]戴着白金项链 而你的项链都是铁的
[01:42.39]小子 你太穷了 这无可反驳
[01:44.08]我的钞票无与伦比的多
[01:45.82]我把鞋子提起来 就能看到红色的条纹
[01:47.46]她的高跟鞋 鞋底是红色
